mapper.select: SELECT s.device_number, date_format(max(e.measure_time),'%Y-%m-%d-%T') AS measure_time, date_format(MAX(e.update_time),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_time, CASE WHEN date_format(MAX(e.update_time),'%m-%d %T%') = date_format(now(),'%m-%d %T') THEN 'Danger' ELSE 'Safe' END AS alarm, substr(NOW(3),21,24) AS time FROM rrps.mb_sensor s LEFT JOIN rrps.mb_event e ON s.device_number = e.device_number GROUP BY s.device_number ORDER BY s.device_number

SELECT device_number, date_format(measure_time,'%Y-%m-%d-%T') AS measure_time, temperature1, temperature2, temperature3 FROM rrps.mb_sensor WHERE device_number = #{device_number} AND measure_time = #{measure_time}
SELECT device_number, measure_time, temperature1, temperature2, temperature3 FROM rrps.mb_sensor WHERE device_number = #{device_number} ORDER BY measure_time
